thread.title: Lynda Richardson
thread.title_full: Bella Barista - For Coffee Lovers reviewed by Lynda Richardson

author: Lynda Richardson
title: Lynda Richardson
text: We spent some time researching which coffee machine to go for and decided we needed to see different machines - and see them in action as well before buying. Bella Barista seemed the best place to go, and we are so pleased we did. Marko spent ages with us explaining all the machines and demonstrating how to use them properly. Cannot praise him and the shop highly enough. We are delighted with our Appartamento. Their coffee is excellent as well!
